item.description: https://www.facebook.... Hi all! As you all know door to door is one of the most important things we can do to get Ron Paul a victory in New Hampshire. This is why we are creating a canvasing of Hanover for December 10th. Here is the run down: 11 am meet at EVA's the campaign will buy lunch and... hand out lists of Republicans and Independents in Hanover. All materials will be provide. 11:40 lunch ends and we go door to door. End canvasing just before sun down. Please invite anyone you think can help us out. In Liberty, Sam
item.name: Door To Door in Hanover
